channel.title: George's STAT 787 Showcase
channel.description: Recent content on George's STAT 787 Showcase

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Hi, I’m Chenliang Cao, but you can call me George. I’m currently in my first year as a graduate student at RIT, studying Applied Statistics. I’ve already earned a Master’s degree in Data Science last year. This is my showcase website for my STAT 787 course. avatar
